# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia

using Test

function wrap_string(text_input::String, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = split(text_input, " ")
    result = ""

    current_length = 0

    for line in lines
        if current_length + length(line) > text_width
            result = result*line*"\n"
            current_length = 0
        end
        current_length += length(line) + 1
        result = result*line*" "
    end

    result = result[1:end-1] # remove last space

    return result
end

@test wrap_string(text_input = "This function will wrap words into lines") == "This function\nwill wrap\nwords into\nlines"
@test wrap_string("Hello we are learning to split some text over multiple lines", 10) == "Hello we\nare\nlearning\nto split\nsome text\nover\nmultiple\nlines"

```
